=C2=A0
How come I'm not seeing these negative emails?=C2=A0 Hmm, maybe my y=
ahoo mail client has a positive only filter :)
=C2=A0
Personally, I'm just =
on here to listen to other recordings.=C2=A0 Even though I built a Frank's =
Box, I have not had time to really work with it.
=C2=A0
Although I'm amazed=
 that people keep up the negative stuff when it really does not matter.=C2=
=A0 What matters is the cool stuff these boxes are capable of or whether or=
 not they actually work.=C2=A0 What does NOT matter is who started it.
=C2=
=A0
Of course I know *I* did not start it so I don't have a dog in that fig=
ht (as it were).
=C2=A0
Still, if you want to argue about something, argue =
about whether the phenonomen is real or not.=C2=A0 I'd be interested in rea=
ding those flame wars ))
=C2=A0
Don
 

________________________________
 Fr=
om: Urkel23 <urkel23@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Friday, Ja=
nuary 27, 2012 6:56 PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: FYI and more FYI
  

 
=C2=A0=
  
 

I'm sitting here minding my own business and i'm dragged into yet ano=
ther negative post.

This used to be a great group and an original for this=
 field, about 6 years ago before anybody knew about ghost boxes a few of us=
 were here doing our research and posting our stuff. 

Just look in the arc=
hives to see the activity we use to have here.  It's true, i do use this gr=
oup mainly to allow fellow enthusiasts to own a decent box at a cheap price=
. 

There are 900 people here to target, although there never is a post any=
more. 

Me and others do all of our posting at my RTSC yahoo group, where i=
 help individuals daily with advice and links to FREE downloads and ideas t=
o test and try.

Despite what frank says, i never claimed to invent anythin=
g or say he didn't.  That all came from his brain and it was all made up.

=
All i did was add a function generator kit for $10 to a radio to make it sw=
eep.  I got the idea from Rich Georgina on my group, that wasn't my idea ei=
ther.

All these things are all documented everywhere with me giving all th=
e credit to Bill Chappel, frank, rich, joe.

Somehow franks lies went mains=
tream about me.  If you don't believe what i'm saying, i have all this FREE=
 information documented on my site for 6 years now.  I have never made any =
money off of anybody and i offer everything for Free on my site including a=
ll the hacks i did and how to make your own ghost boxes with a sweep circui=
t.  I even have the links on where to get the parts to build them cheap.

S=
o before you post something else negative, do your homework on who people a=
re and what they have contributed without any fame in mind or monetary moti=
ves.

-Steve H.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Country" <countrybumpkin1=
956@...> wrote:
>
> Just wanted to let everyone know who thinks they create=
d the ghost box that I just finished reading another book, 101 Ways To Find=
 A Ghost by Melissa Martin Ellis, printed in 2011. In her book she mentions=
 the creator of the ghost box and the name in print is Frank Sumption, not =
Urkel /ultay or anyone else.
> 
> This should please Frank but instead he w=
ill probably be mad and bitter about something. He does not seem to look at=
 the good in this group or the good in life. In some areas I think this gro=
up has gotten way off course as to the original reason for starting the gro=
up.
> 
> Also, as far as I can see Urkel/hultay uses this group to promote =
whatever boxes he has for sale, eBay or otherwise. Then we have the others =
who heve a signature trailer of  paragrapgh length on anything and everythi=
ng they offer (for a fee of course).....private frank box sessions? That al=
most sounds like another chris moon, spirit medium? What does that have to =
do with this group that was created becuz of ghost box research?
> 
> This =
group seems to have fallen apart and the expletive words in every 3-4 messa=
ge doesnt help. I really have had enuf at this point.
> 
> Good luck, Misty=
, hang on as long as u can :) life is too short to try and keep a bunch of =
"I am better than anyone else" happy and in line, meaning doing ghost box r=
esearch.....
> CB
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Country" <countr=
ybumpkin1956@> wrote:
> > Obviously I am way behind in my message reading o=
n this group, I also rarely post for fear of being attacked by someone as w=
ell. Anyone who has been involved with EVP - whether radio sweep, digital r=
ecorder, Digital  Dowsing gadgets, etc etc etc - knows that Frank Sumption =
was the leader in radio sweep. Why do you have to be so angry and continual=
ly use the F word. Every ghost or paranormal book I have read ( and I have =
well over 100 on my bookshelf) gives credit to you, Frank, and every parano=
rmal or ghost magazine has given credit to you when there are articles abou=
t using radios for paranormal investigation. As i said earlier, most educat=
ed people in radio evp know who created the wheel in this area. So why do y=
ou let a tiny little yahoo group and a few uneducated posters bother you, w=
hich in turn upsets the rest of us.
> > 
> > CB
>
